analysis.description:
Reentrancy in GoldmintPool.migrateToNewControllerContract (/unique_chucks/45/0x53fce38a5f9fe6544fb32034ba5abafdd6e925de.sol#287-302):
	External calls:
	- core.setNewControllerAddress(newControllerAddr) (/unique_chucks/45/0x53fce38a5f9fe6544fb32034ba5abafdd6e925de.sol#291)
	- mntpTokenAmount = getMntpBalance() (/unique_chucks/45/0x53fce38a5f9fe6544fb32034ba5abafdd6e925de.sol#293-296)
	- goldTokenAmount = getGoldBalance() (/unique_chucks/45/0x53fce38a5f9fe6544fb32034ba5abafdd6e925de.sol#296)
	- mntpToken.transfer(newControllerAddr,mntpTokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/45/0x53fce38a5f9fe6544fb32034ba5abafdd6e925de.sol#297-298)
	- goldToken.transfer(newControllerAddr,goldTokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/45/0x53fce38a5f9fe6544fb32034ba5abafdd6e925de.sol#298-302)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isActualContractVer (/unique_chucks/45/0x53fce38a5f9fe6544fb32034ba5abafdd6e925de.sol#302)

GoldmintPool.holdStake (/unique_chucks/45/0x53fce38a5f9fe6544fb32034ba5abafdd6e925de.sol#216-228) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mntpToken.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),mntpAmount) (/unique_chucks/45/0x53fce38a5f9fe6544fb32034ba5abafdd6e925de.sol#222-223)

GoldmintPool.unholdStake (/unique_chucks/45/0x53fce38a5f9fe6544fb32034ba5abafdd6e925de.sol#228-236) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mntpToken.transfer(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/45/0x53fce38a5f9fe6544fb32034ba5abafdd6e925de.sol#235)

GoldmintPool.distribShareProfit (/unique_chucks/45/0x53fce38a5f9fe6544fb32034ba5abafdd6e925de.sol#236-248) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mntpToken.transferFrom(tokenBankAddress,address(this),mntpReward) (/unique_chucks/45/0x53fce38a5f9fe6544fb32034ba5abafdd6e925de.sol#239-241)
	-goldToken.transferFrom(tokenBankAddress,address(this),goldReward) (/unique_chucks/45/0x53fce38a5f9fe6544fb32034ba5abafdd6e925de.sol#243-244)

GoldmintPool.withdrawUserReward (/unique_chucks/45/0x53fce38a5f9fe6544fb32034ba5abafdd6e925de.sol#248-271) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mntpToken.transfer(msg.sender,mntpReward) (/unique_chucks/45/0x53fce38a5f9fe6544fb32034ba5abafdd6e925de.sol#263-264)
	-goldToken.transfer(msg.sender,goldReward) (/unique_chucks/45/0x53fce38a5f9fe6544fb32034ba5abafdd6e925de.sol#266-268)

GoldmintPool.migrateToNewControllerContract (/unique_chucks/45/0x53fce38a5f9fe6544fb32034ba5abafdd6e925de.sol#287-302) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mntpToken.transfer(newControllerAddr,mntpTokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/45/0x53fce38a5f9fe6544fb32034ba5abafdd6e925de.sol#297-298)
	-goldToken.transfer(newControllerAddr,goldTokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/45/0x53fce38a5f9fe6544fb32034ba5abafdd6e925de.sol#298-302)
